search.query: | rest splunk_server=* /services/saved/searches | fields splunk_server, author, title, disabled, eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner, eai:acl.sharing, id, search, alert.suppress.period, cron_schedule | search eai:acl.app = DC_cyber_secmon | rename title AS saved_search_name eai:acl.app AS app eai:acl.owner AS owner eai:acl.sharing AS sharing search AS spl_code | eval is_enabled = case(disabled >=1, "disabled",1=1, "enabled") | table splunk_server, author, saved_search_name, disabled, is_enabled, app, owner, sharing, spl_code, alert.suppress.period, cron_schedule
